ai-iti31:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti31:2.1_0: “These two things are earned by miser.
ai-iti31:2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by two?
ai-iti31:2.3_0: It’s when someone has done good and skillful things that keep them safe, but has not done bad, violent, and depraved things.
ai-iti31:2.4_0: Thinking, ‘I have done good things’, they’re not mortified. Thinking, ‘I haven’t done bad things’, they’re not mortified.
ai-iti31:2.5_0: These are the two things that make a statement.”
ai-iti31:4.3_0: When their body breaks up, that wise person
ai-iti31:4.4_0: they’re reborn in a heavenly realm.”
ai-iti31:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
